name: Vampire Ghost
effectText: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 other "Vampire" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; add 1 Level 4 or higher "Vampire" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, send 1 Level 2 or lower "Vampire" monster from your Deck to the GY. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY and pay 500 LP; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Vampire" monster. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Ghost" once per turn.
